name: The Slayer (MykG)
description:
The Slayer is a prototype game where you will have to survive as long as possible in a wave-based system with unlimited undead enemies looking for their next prey and limited supplies scattered around the map. 

Created as a group final project for a game development course within a 4-week time constraint*

Controls:

  • Tab (Hold) - Open stats
  • B - Open inventory
  • F - Pick up weapons/meds
  • G - Drop the current weapon
  • Q - Swap between two weapons (if any)
  • C - Crouch
  • WASD & Spacebar - Basic Movement
  • H (Hold) - Display controls
  • E (Double Tap) - Opening doors 

The group that worked on this project consisted of myself,  danielreyes2873, TonyZhang20, JosephArr12, Markudi & JasonCasareno
